item.title: International Society for Environmental Epidemiology 2021
item.description:
I presented my oral abstract entitled “Roadway Proximity and Lung Cancer Risk in NIH-AARP Diet and Health Study Participants” at the 33rd Annual Conference of the International Society for Environmental Epidemiology held virtually due to the global COVID-19 pandemic. I was also a co-author on three abstracts:

  1. “Residential proximity to animal feeding operations and mortality among postmenopausal women in the Iowa Women’s Health Study” led by Dr. Jessica Madrigal
  2. “Residential proximity to animal feeding operations and risk of lymphohematopoietic cancers in the Iowa Women’s Health Study” led by Dr. Jard Fisher
  3. “Ethylene oxide emissions and risk of breast cancer and Non-Hodgkin lymphoma in a large U.S. cohort” led by Dr. Rena Jones
